CustomField.description: Used to translate certain values to other values during the transformation. Pipe separated text for each translation. I.e. for "1=PHD Applicant|2=Graduate|3=Skilled" when we have "2" in the source field, "Graduate" is placed in the target field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used to translate certain values to other values during the transformation. Pipe separated text for each translation. I.e. for "1=PHD Applicant|2=Graduate|3=Skilled" when we have "2" in the source field, "Graduate" is placed in the target field.
CustomField.label: Translation
